Title: At least 80 political prisoners freed in Venezuela
Summary: At least 80 political prisoners were freed Sunday in Venezuela . Detainees are slowly being released under pressure from the United States, a non-governmental organization says .

Title: Kano Gov Abba Yusuf to defect to APC on Monday
Summary: Kano Gov Abba Yusuf to defect to APC on Monday . The move is expected to strengthen cooperation with the Federal Government, accelerate development, enhance security, and improve service delivery .

Title: Rep Bob slams Tinubu’s aide Bwala over comments on Wike, Rivers crisis
Summary: Rep Bob slams Tinubu’s aide Bwala over comments on Wike, Rivers crisis . Mr. Bob was reacting to comments credited to the presidential aide during a television programme on Friday .

Title: I endured 10 years of my son not knowing his father — Tonto Dikeh
Summary: Nollywood actress Tonto Dikeh has shared an emotional testimony recounting her journey through pain, forgiveness and restoration following her reconciliation with her ex-husband, Olakunle Churchill . The actress said she endured 10 years of my son not knowing his father .

Title: Reps disown Minority Caucus interim report on tax laws
Summary: Reps disown Minority Caucus interim report on tax laws . House further explained that any interim or final report produced by a caucus-led body “cannot be laid before the House .

Title: Pregnant woman dies after botched delivery in Ondo illegal clinic
Summary: The Ondo State Police Command has arrested a man, Kehinde Olawuyi, and his wife, Eniola Olawu, over the death of a 28-year-old pregnant woman . The deceased, simply identified as Iyanu, was said to have been admitted to the facility for childbirth . The

Title: 2027: Akwa Ibom traditional rulers endorse Tinubu, Akpabio, Eno
Summary: Traditional rulers in Akwa Ibom State have endorsed President Bola Tinubu, Senate President Godswill Akpabio, and Governor Umo Eno for a second term in office . The monarchs comprised Paramount Rulers, Clan Heads, Village and Family Heads, as well as their spouses . The endorsement was announced

Title: EPL: Aston Villa beat Newcastle 2-0 to stay in title hunt
Summary: Aston Villa close to within four points of Premier League summit with 2-0 win at Newcastle . Arsenal can stretch their advantage over Villa and Manchester City back to seven points when they host Manchester United later on Sunday . Title: EPL: Chelsea beat Palace 3-1 to boost top-four push
Summary: Chelsea maintained their dominance over Crystal Palace with a 3-1 Premier League victory at Selhurst Park on Sunday . Title: Dismissing minority report on tax laws alteration will aid impunity — Rep
Summary: Chairman of House of Reps minority caucus Ad-hoc Committee, Afam Ogene, has warned that dismissing the committee’s interim report would only encourage impunity and undermine the authority of the National Assembly .
